16.heading: Holbrook, Bill, 1958-

19.heading: Holbrook, Bill, 1958-

165.author: [No author]

166.heading: Holdups.
166.title: "Le Rendez-vous d'Eagle Creek"
166.author: [No author]
166.series: Giddap Joe) p. 97-128 in Cap'tain Swing, no. 112
notes: Summary: Vivian O'Malley's husband Malcolm Asner is a disappointment. He never sticks up for himself or makes his own decisions. Vivian learns that Malcolm owes money and that he is planning a holdup at Eagle Creek, with three other men, to get it. Vivian asks Giddap Joe to intervene if he can, and Joe isn't sure what good it will do. Joe follows along until he sees Malcolm change his mind about the holdup, then helps Malcolm extricate himself from his relationship with the other men.
